text: 15:27 1 Cor 9:11Masi touba haibasi makhoigi apenba oirammi; tasengnadi makhoidi makhoida mateng pangnaba laman tollabani. Maramdi Jihudi nattaba phurupsingna Jihudisinggi thawaigi oiba yaipha thoujal adugi saruk phangminnarabadi, makhoina makhoigi lan-thumgi nungai yaiphaba adusu Jihudisingda mateng pangpham thok-i.
